lead_paragraph: The N.B.A. made its first foray to Las Vegas last weekend, bringing in an estimated 85,000 fans and $90.6 million in non-gaming revenue, and stirring hope that an N.B.A. team would settle there.
snippet: The N.B.A. made its first foray to Las Vegas last weekend, bringing in an estimated 85,000 fans and $90.6 million in non-gaming revenue, and stirring hope that an N.B.A. team would settle there.
